heading: HR00045
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ALLOCATE FUNDING FOR THE CONDUCT OF A MAPPING SURVEY TO IDENTIFY THE BOUNDS AND METES OF THE AREA, EAST OF LUZON KNOWN AS THE ꞌBENHAM RISEꞌ, WHICH WAS APPROVED BY THE UNITED NATIONS CONVENTION OF THE LAW OF THE SEA (UNCLOS) AS PART OF THE PHILIPPINE TERRITORY, INCLUDING THE MARINE EXPLORATION FOR MINERAL DEPOSITS WHICH MAYBE USED AS ALTERNATIVE SOURCE OF ENERGY AND OTHER RESOURCES THAT WILL BE FOUND THEREIN
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00111 on 2018-02-06 Substituted by HR01636
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00045
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ALLOCATE FUNDING FOR THE CONDUCT OF A MAPPING SURVEY TO IDENTIFY THE BOUNDS AND METES OF THE AREA, EAST OF LUZON KNOWN AS THE ꞌBENHAM RISEꞌ, WHICH WAS APPROVED BY THE UNITED NATIONS CONVENTION OF THE LAW OF THE SEA (UNCLOS) AS PART OF THE PHILIPPINE TERRITORY, INCLUDING THE MARINE EXPLORATION FOR MINERAL DEPOSITS WHICH MAYBE USED AS ALTERNATIVE SOURCE OF ENERGY AND OTHER RESOURCES THAT WILL BE FOUND THEREIN
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HR01636
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS ON 2016-07-26
